ygData.subject: armors
ygData.msgSnippet: first off, WHAT is steel ribbed? do you mean reinforced, or is this a higher level armor that you can smith? lemme know so i can decide wether or not to
ygData.messageBody:
first off, WHAT is steel ribbed? do you mean reinforced, or is this a higher
level armor that you can smith? lemme know so i can decide wether or not to
continue pouring money into smithing :)

as for cool armors, i know of at least one type of black plate, and possibly
two. the one i know of for certain is black iron armor, found on some of the
higher level critters in runnyeye. the problem with this armor is that it is
basically one-size-fits-all ringmail, having the ac of chain but being
rather heavy. on the upside, it IS colored black. the rumored black plate
armor is found in lower guk. i have heard that, at least in beta, there was
black colored plate armor found down there that MAY or MAY NOT be SK-only.
of course, since hardly anybody is yet high enough level to form a proper
party to go genocidal on froggies in lower guk yet, this report has to
remain unsubstantiated for now. if ever you do head down to lower guk tho
(perchance to get yourself a darkreaver) be sure to keep your eye out, and
kill things that look like they may have good equipment. lastly, there is
the rubicite armor from cazic thule. while the camping situation by this
armor is quite hideous, what you get is armor with the ac of plate, the
weight of leather, and a very cool shade of red. so if you dont want to be a
black knight, you can always be a red knight :)

i've seen one of the lead admin wearing full BLUE plate armor, but wether
this is obtained off of some high level npc, a god, or is just GM-made
armor, i cannot know. but it looked damn nice.

thats about all i know of for now, anybody else know of cool armors, their
stats, or how to find them?

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
